titleStmt.title: A miscellany of divers problems containing ingenuous solutions of sundry questions, partly moral, partly of other subjects / translated out of French by Henry Some ...
Meslange de divers problèmes. English
titleStmt.author: Pellisson-Fontanier, Paul, 1624-1693.
Some, Henry.
Thoms, Samuel.
Pellisson, Georges, d. 1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Adams and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Meslange de divers problèmes.
The dedication states this work to be by P. Pellisson, who wrote the history of the French academy, also translated by Some.
Also attributed to George Pellisson. Cf. BM.
First ed. of this translation. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
